artist: Giuseppe Rosaspina; After Guercino (Giovanni Francesco Barbieri); Francesco Rosaspina
description: Virgin holding child seated on a cloud surrounded by angels and cherubs; below St. Bruno kneeling with bishop's mitre and staff at his knees; hooded figure kneeling left holding a cross; skull and crucifix at right

title: S. Bruno in Orazione
